name: 83 Whiting Street Bed & Breakfast

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We booked the same day via the Tourist Office, and were not disappointed. This central location provided us with a welcome break after a tiring day. An excellent room and hearty breakfast was provided by Vana and Gordon. Their medieval house has a wall painting dated 1530 in the diningroom. Overnight undercover (pay) parking is available in the council park nearby.
reviews.title: Welcoming and comfortable

aka: 83 Whiting Street Bed & Breakfast Bury St. Edmunds, Suffolk
